Proper controls, monitoring and corrective actions need to be taken while using frozen storage. These are very similar to those applied to refrigerated storage.

Frozen food should not be allowed to rise above -15째C and should never be stored above the load line.

All food should be suitably packaged to prevent freezer burn i.e. to prevent food drying out and protect it from contamination.
